author: John Doe
title: Introduction to Node.js
body: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.

author: Jane Smith
title: React Hooks Tutorial
body: React Hooks are a new addition to React that lets you use state and other React features without writing a class.

author: David Johnson
title: MongoDB Basics
body: MongoDB is a NoSQL database that provides high performance, high availability, and easy scalability.
